thread.section_title: American Gold Exchange Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Gold Exchange | amergold.com
thread.title: Robert Pantages
thread.title_full: American Gold Exchange reviewed by Robert Pantages

author: Robert Pantages
title: Robert Pantages
text:
All good things to say about AGE! Tom and his staff did a wonderful job answering questions and taking care of helping me place me order.
When the package arrived, I was very pleased about the excellent job of how well and secure the coins were packed. It exemplified the level of service AGE provides to each customer. They take the time necessary to do the job correctly the first time - from inquiry to order, to final delivery.
Very pleased with my experience and I will be returning to purchase more in 2017!
